snippet: Wednesday’s Eastern Conference playoff match was abandoned before it began because of swirling wind and snow in the New York metropolitan area from a northeaster.
abstract: Major League Soccer cancels Eastern Conference playoff match between New York Red Bulls and DC United because of bad weather.
lead_paragraph: Wednesday’s Eastern Conference playoff match was abandoned before it began because of swirling wind and snow in the New York metropolitan area from a northeaster.

headline.seo: Red Bulls’ Game Against D.C. United Is Postponed
headline.main: Red Bulls’ Game Against D.C. United Is Postponed
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Playoff Game Is Postponed
